name: NortonLifeLock Optimization File
summary: LightningSand.cfd is a file created by certain NortonLifeLock cybersecurity programs released in the early 2010s. It is always located within a drive's System Volume Information folder. LightningSand.cfd is an unnecessary file that can cause your system to produce error messages. You should delete LightningSand.cfd if possible.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
